description:
What's the best way to give your everyday wardrobe a sustainable upgrade? With the prAna Iconicon T-Shirt for men.

This Fair Trade Certified™ staple is made from a breathable blend of organic cotton and recycled polyester. From there, it has a classic standard fit that looks good on its own or layered under a button-down shirt. The end result? Comfy, cool, and casual vibes perfect for any day of the week.
name: Prana prAna Iconicon T-Shirt - Mens
